Articles.Content:
I am trying to make a custom engine with two nozzles (For example, the Titan II's main engine) and was wondering if in unity if I should put two thrustTransforms on each nozzle or just one in the middle?

Edited December 19, 2023 by SpaceNerd032
Typo
You would put two (one for each nozzle).  If you put a single one in the middle, you'll have a plume coming out of seemingly nowhere between the nozzles.
